files.template:
# Starlight OG Automation (CI Guide)

## Options
- Generate per-commit in CI before build (recommended)
- Generate locally and commit artifacts (simple, but noisy diffs)

## GitHub Pages (sample)
```yaml
- run: npm run og:gen
- run: npm run build
- uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
  with: { path: dist }
```

## Cloudflare Pages (sample)
```yaml
- run: npm run og:gen
- run: npm run build
- uses: cloudflare/pages-action@v1
  with:
    apiToken: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
    accountId: $ACCOUNT
    projectName: $PROJECT
    directory: dist
```

## Tips
- Source OG from frontmatter: `ogTitle` or `title` fallback
- Dedicate `public/og/` for paths mirroring docs structure
- Ensure `site` in `astro.config.mjs` matches deployment URL
- Cache images in CDN with long TTL

See spikes: `starlight-og-auto-batch-minimal`, `starlight-og-auto-ci-ghpages`, `starlight-og-auto-ci-cloudflare`.
